price: Na wakitoa moto kwa kupiga kwato zao chini,
footnotes: Na kwa farasi hao ambao hutoa cheche za moto zinapo gonga kwato zao kwenye ardhi wanapo kwenda.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
